snippet: The police, citing terrorism laws, issued a temporary order withholding legal assistance to the detainees, the Istanbul Bar Association said.
abstract: Turkish antiterrorism police units in Istanbul raid dozens of residences in a crackdown on those who participated in widespread antigovernment demonstrations in June 2013, detaining at least 30 people.
lead_paragraph: The police, citing terrorism laws, issued a temporary order withholding legal assistance to the detainees, the Istanbul Bar Association said.

headline.main: Turkish Police Detain 30 in Crackdown on Demonstrators
